page.title: 08PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: {Bull dog}or{British BullDog}have been played for ages. My mum used to play it when she was at school. I play at school today . Another game like bull dog is called"{Blue and purple" and"{Pink and}purple".People at aged five or six sing"{RING A RING A { ROSES"}and when you get older you think it is babyish.I sometimes play skipping and you have songs"Bumper Car" and"Sallys in the kitchen."You can either play it just with you holding the rope or two people holding the rope.As you play these are some of the songs you can sing"{BUMPER CAR_ {I'm a}little bumper car going round the cor,or, or, or, or, or,or ner and suddenly I slammed on my brake. { SALLYS IN THE KITCHEN."}Sallys in the kitchen doing a bit of knitting in pops a bogy man and pushes sally out."
